job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations.
     * Advising customers on how to optimize the use of our solution within their operational landscape.
     * Deploying and integrating our solution within a wide variety of organizations.
     * Improving our customer service practices and support tools.
     * Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services.
     * Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution.
     * Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer success, user experience, and support tools.
     * Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI) to innovate and enhance support processes.

   What s in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become a front-runner with the latest tools and developments in customer success.
     * Doing good contribute to solving one of the key global challenges: the data/privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of treats, drinks, and social events.
     * Great and easily accessible office location in Amsterdam.
     * Flexible working arrangements and working from home.
job_details.full_text:
Customer Success Engineer

* Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations.
     * Advising customers on how to optimize the use of our solution within their operational landscape.
     * Deploying and integrating our solution within a wide variety of organizations.
     * Improving our customer service practices and support tools.
     * Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services.
     * Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution.
     * Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer success, user experience, and support tools.
     * Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI) to innovate and enhance support processes.

   What s in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become a front-runner with the latest tools and developments in customer success.
     * Doing good contribute to solving one of the key global challenges: the data/privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of treats, drinks, and social events.
     * Great and easily accessible office location in Amsterdam.
     * Flexible working arrangements and working from home.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on customer success, operational improvements, and the use of AI tools to enhance productivity rather than the development or deep technical implementation of AI models. While generative AI is mentioned as a technology to innovate support processes, the core responsibilities do not align with the specialized tasks of an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.

phrases: Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations
Advising customers on how to optimize the use of our solution within their operational landscape
Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services
Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution
Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer success, user experience, and support tools
Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI) to innovate and enhance support processes
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a focus on understanding business needs, optimizing solutions for customers, and aligning technical efforts with business goals and customer success metrics.

phrases: Deploying and integrating our solution within a wide variety of organizations
Improving our customer service practices and support tools
Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer success, user experience, and support tools
job_tasks.justification: These phrases involve the practical application and integration of solutions, which can include software deployment and management, though not necessarily core AI model development.

phrases: Deploying and integrating our solution within a wide variety of organizations
Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer success, user experience, and support tools
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, the deployment and management of 'our solution' and 'support tools' within organizations touches upon operational aspects of delivering a technical product.

phrases: Advising customers on how to optimize the use of our solution within their operational landscape
Deploying and integrating our solution within a wide variety of organizations
soft_skills.justification: Advising customers and deploying solutions requires strong communication and collaboration with clients.

phrases: Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become a front-runner with the latest tools and developments in customer success
continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI) to innovate and enhance support processes
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on staying current with technologies and seeking innovative solutions highlights the need for continuous learning and adaptability.

phrases: Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations
Advising customers on how to optimize the use of our solution within their operational landscape
Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution
soft_skills.justification: These phrases describe the core activities of analyzing issues, devising strategies, and implementing practical solutions to improve customer service.

phrases: Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI) to innovate and enhance support processes
An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality
soft_skills.justification: The job description encourages proactive innovation, pushing boundaries, and taking ownership of solutions within a startup environment.
